name: 71”W Garage Shelving Units, 5000LBS Storage Shelves Heavy Duty, 24" Deep Metal Shelving Rack, 4 Tier Large Tall Industrial Shelving , Adjustable Standing Shelf for Warehouse / Shop 71"W x 24"D x 70"H
short_description: 【Real Heavy Duty All Metal Shelf】➤The heavy-duty garage storage shelves features an integrated vertical design with thicker, wider columns and beams for enhanced strength and load capacity. Reinforced beams support heavy loads reliably, even with frequent use. Beneath each layer of the robust metal frame, there are 5 sturdy ribs that enable the metal shelves to effortlessly support a weight capacity of 5000 pounds.

【Flexible Expansion & Adjustable Shelves】➤This rack shelf features adjustable heights for each layer by repositioning the crossbar to accommodate tall or large items. If you order more, multiple units can be seamlessly connected one by one for customizable configurations to meet your expansion needs flexibly .The expandable shelves is a perfect storage solution for garages, shops, warehouses, basement,supermarket,etc.

【Reinforced Diagonal Braces and Lateral Bars】➤ By connecting the columns and beams on both sides which create a triangle structure, this design promotes an even distribution of weight throughout the structure, thereby enhancing the overall stability and Sturdiness of the frame. It effectively resists forces that could induce twisting or bending in the garage shelves. This not only increases load-bearing capacity but also enhances safety and stablity for storage unit, ensuring a secure storage environment for users and their items.

【Detachable & Moudular Shelf】➤ To meet the diverse storage needs of our customers, we created the deep shelves with modular metal panels. Based on the detachable nature of each panel, you can detach any panel to creat custom space, this provides customers with great flexibility and convenience in storing products of various sizes, thus offering another new solution to the problem of disorganized storage.

【Triple Protection Function】➤The heavy duty shelving is made from high-strength cold-rolled steel and features an advanced powder coating. This combination ensures durability, rust resistance, and anti-corrosion properties. Additionally, it enhances scratch and wear resistance, maintaining the garage shelf's integrity and appearance over time. The locking pins further enhance the tight connection between the beams and uprights, making the entire storage shelving more stable, improving security, preventing accidental disassembly, and ensuring the safe storage of goods. Finally, the protective foot pad prevents scratches on your floor when moving the steel utility shelf.

【Easy Assembly & Quick Response】➤ AFAIF 4 tier large industrial shelving come with a hammer, a pair of gloves and a detailed user manual which can help you assemble each shelf fast. If you need any assistant in using or installation for this retail shelves, please refer to the video in the online listing firstly and contact with us without any hesitation, we will reply to you within 24 hours and promise to help you and make you satisfied.

name: Garage Shelving Unit, Heavy Duty Metal Adjustable Storage, Steel Shelves, Industrial Shelves for Heavy Tools and Equipment, Ideal for Garage, Basement, Black (5-Tier, 71.2" H x 48" W x 24" D)
short_description: 【Anti-Fall Safety Rails for Secure Storage】 Each shelf is equipped with specially designed anti-fall safety rails to ensure that your items are securely stored without the risk of falling. Whether you’re placing heavy tools, boxes, or other valuable items, these rails provide an added layer of protection, preventing items from slipping off the shelf. This feature is especially useful in busy garages or workshops where things can get bumped or jostled. This helps reduce the chances of items accidentally toppling over or rolling off onto the floor, offering enhanced security for both your belongings and workspace

【 Upgraded Dual-Layer Columns for Enhanced Stability】 Unlike standard shelves on the market that use single-layer columns, our product features upgraded dual-layer columns that significantly boost stability and load-bearing capacity. The reinforced structure helps distribute the weight evenly, reducing the risk of warping or sagging over time. This ensures the shelf remains stable even under heavier loads. In comparison, shelves with single-layer columns can wobble or bend when storing heavier items, making them less reliable for larger, bulkier tools or materials

【 All-Steel Shelves with Reinforced Bottom Bracing for Maximum Load Capacity】 Unlike typical wooden shelves that are prone to warping, cracking, or moisture damage, this product features all-steel shelves with reinforced bottom bracing. These steel panels are designed to handle significantly heavier loads, making them ideal for storing a wide range of heavy-duty items. The bracing underneath provides extra support, helping to maintain the integrity of the shelf over time. Wood shelves, in contrast, may absorb moisture in damp environments like garages, leading to structural damage and reduced load capacity

【Split Into Two Units with Adjustable Shelf Heights】 Flexibility is key, and this garage shelf provides exactly that. The unit can be split into two separate shelves, giving you the freedom to arrange them as needed within your space. Each shelf’s height is fully adjustable, so you can customize the layout to fit your items perfectly—whether you need tall shelves for larger items or more compact storage for smaller tools. This adaptability makes it easy to reorganize your garage or workshop as your storage needs change over time, providing a flexible solution for varied storage requirements

【Tool-Free Installation with Bolt-Free Slotted Design for Easy Assembly】 Forget the hassle of complicated assembly instructions and missing bolts—this shelving unit features a unique bolt-free slotted design for quick and easy installation. While many wooden shelving units require screws and additional hardware, our innovative design allows you to set up the structure without any tools, saving time and effort. Even if you’re not a DIY expert, most users can have it ready for use in a short amount of time, providing a practical and time-saving storage solution

short_description: 【Heavy-Duty Steel Construction】Built with durable cold-rolled steel, this garage shelving unit features thickened uprights and cross beams for reliable stability. The scientific frame design of this metal shelving evenly distributes weight, minimizing concerns about shifting or bending—making it more sturdy than common plastic or wooden storage shelves. With a 3000-lb capacity, this metal shelving system is a practical solution for garage storage needs, pairing well with other garage shelves for organized space

【Tool-Free Assembly in 10 Minutes】Designed for simple setup, our storage rack uses interlocking mechanisms—no bolts, nuts, or tools required. Even beginners can assemble this garage shelving unit in just 10 minutes, saving time for arranging your garage shelves and other storage essentials

【Adjustable & Customizable Shelves】Tailor this metal shelf to fit items of any size! The movable crossbars of this garage shelving allow easy height adjustment, while split-able shelves offer DIY flexibility—perfect for pairing with other storage shelves to maximize space. It’s well-suited for organizing tools, bins, or bulky items that often clutter standard garage shelves

【Enhanced Stability with Double-Layer Uprights】Compared to basic single-layer metal shelving, our upgraded double-layer uprights for this garage shelving boost load-bearing capacity and help reduce warping. Ideal for heavy-duty use, this metal shelving design supports long-term durability with minimized wobbling or sagging, outperforming flimsier storage shelves in daily use

【Quality Support and Thoughtful Service】Our dedicated customer service ready to answer any questions for you at any time. From steel selection to welding and forming, each process undergoes three rounds of quality control inspections: strength testing, load-bearing verification, and detail polishing, ensuring the shelf is stable and durable, allowing you to safely store tools, parts, and other items with peace of mind.
